word_mean: 输血，输液，输入：输入全血、血液成分或液体直接进入血流。参见infusion

The project badly needs a transfusion of cash.

sentence.Network_en: She soon came to her senses after a blood transfusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 输血后不久她就苏醒了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin transfusio(n-), from the verb transfundere (see transfuse)

entry.def: A transfusion is the same as a blood transfusion .

means.word_mean: 1. the introduction of blood or blood plasma into a vein or artery
2. the action of pouring a liquid from one vessel to another
